page.title: 14Sports, Hobbies and Music
page.content: {Adbaston} Among Adults - gardening, walking, eating out and the local pub are popular. Outdoor activities in decreasing order of popularity, are cycling, swimming, golf, football, cricket, tennis, badminton, rounders and motor bike trials.Indoor activities include reading, sewing, knitting, music making and appreciation, painting cooking,photography, wine making, and choir. More specialised interests are attending sheep shows, membership of Amnesty International, and of Friends of The Earth, recording tapes for the blind, and sound recordings of wild life. Boys like fishing, shooting and football, whilst girls favour athletics and riding. Swimming, Scouts and Guides are popular. Girls also like reading, playing music, and dancing. T.V. and radio appeal to all age ranges.
